/** * AttrNSImpl inherits from AttrImpl and adds namespace support. *

* The qualified name is the node name, and we store localName which is also * used in all queries. On the other hand we recompute the prefix when * necessary. * * @xerces.internal * * @author Arnaud Le Hors, IBM * @author Andy Clark, IBM * @author Ralf Pfeiffer, IBM * @version $Id: AttrNSImpl.java,v 1.48 2005/05/02 22:02:22 mrglavas Exp $ */
